snippet: Before LaVell Edwards was promoted to head coach, BYU ran a slogging run-first offense that yielded mediocre or worse records....
lead_paragraph: Before LaVell Edwards was promoted to head coach, BYU ran a slogging run-first offense that yielded mediocre or worse records.

headline.main: LaVell Edwards, Who Made BYU a Football Power, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: LaVell Edwards, Who Made BYU a Football Power, Dies at 86
